title: Bug wonÂ´t let me start League
body: So, yesterday I was playing LoL as always and it was ok, wanted to play today and when I started the client it ran for a while and before I logged in a bugsplat window popped up and more kept popping up and the client shut itself down and started again in an endless cycle. I tried running it as an administrator, restarting my PC and even reinstalling, but the same thing happened before the game even started to get updated. Could it be a bug caused by the new update?

replies.body: This is likely being caused by a recent issue with Discord.  Disabling Disocrd Overylay should fix this up!
Yeah, that was it. Thank you so much
